title: The Neelambari Diamond Cascade: A Modern Take on the Traditional Haaram
materials: 18K Rose Gold. Featuring princess-cut sapphires and brilliant-cut diamonds. Diamonds are VS clarity
G color. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: A delicate cascade design blending modern aesthetics with the essence of a traditional Haaram. Square Sapphires are bezel set in rose gold, accented by diamond-encrusted teardrop motifs. A graduated diamond fringe adds movement and sparkle.
colors: and brilliant white (diamond). This color palette offers a contemporary take on classic South Indian jewelry hues.
occasions: or a sophisticated half-saree function. A stunning statement piece for any special occasion.
description: A unique blend of traditional and modern design, showcasing exceptional craftsmanship. The combination of sapphires and diamonds offers a touch of regality and elegance, making it a cherished heirloom. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance and durability.
